descriptionHtml:
The newest Inn of solitude

this is the second Inn of the 9 planned Inn\'s

this inn isn\'t as eleborate as the previous one but i have done alot of work that isn\'t directly visible in-game.

this Inn exists out of two parts:
the noble part thats on the balcony where the more wealthy people are.
the part thats open for everyone, this is the room where you enter.

I have tryed to give a certain atmosphere to the Inn (I hope i succeeded in that). I have been testing out the not in-game directly visible aspects of modding like advanced nav meshing and sophisticated walking paterns.

This is the second mod I have ever created, I hope you like it. I would really apreciate your comments and criticism. If you would like to see something added to te inn just tell me and i\'ll see what i can do.

check my other mods:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9932 (The katharia inn)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17797 (Alvors crafting facility)

*NOTE*
I know about the problem that the Inn doesnt show as you leave the Inn my sincere apologies for this problem. I have tried alot to prevent it from not showing but nothing worked, if one of you guys know how to solve this problem en really really apreciate it if you tell me.
author: Marnix Mohrmann
